Entry.JapaneseText: 自己紹介がまだでしたわねェ。 私、パニールと申します
Entry.EnglishText: Oh my, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I? My name is Panille.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここで、家事全般の お世話をさせていただいてます
Entry.EnglishText: I handle all the household duties around here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 趣味は恋愛小説を読む事ですの。 オホホ…、月に１０冊は読んじゃうんです
Entry.EnglishText: My hobbies? Reading romance novels, of course. Ohoho... I go through ten of them a month, easily!

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、男前でいらっしゃるわねェ！ こりゃあ、街の女達が放っておきゃ しませんよ〜
Entry.EnglishText: But my. aren't you handsome! The ladies in town won't be leaving you alone, that's for sure〜
Entry.Notes: This This triggers only if player is male

Entry.JapaneseText: もうそっちの方もお盛んなんでしょ？ あらあら、私ったら 何を言ってるんでしょうねェ
Entry.EnglishText: I bet you're quite the charmer already, aren't you? Oh dear, listen to me.. what am I saying, honestly!
Entry.Notes: This triggers only if player is male

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、カワイコさんねェ！ こんなの港の荒くれ者どもが 放っておきゃしませんよ！
Entry.EnglishText: But my, what a lovely young lady you are! The sailors down at the port won't know what hit them!
Entry.Notes: This triggers only if player is female

Entry.JapaneseText: いい男を見繕わなきゃいけませんわよ？ って、あらあら私、 何を言ってるんでしょうねェ
Entry.EnglishText: You'll need to find yourself a fine gentleman, dear. Oh my, there I go again... what am I saying, honestly!
Entry.Notes: This triggers only if player is female

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ 私が船に乗る理由ですか？ ええ、カノンノと一緒に旅をしてましてね
Entry.EnglishText: Oh? You're wondering why I'm aboardthe ship? Well, I've been traveling together with Kanonno.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、ちょっとここで しばらくご厄介になってるんです
Entry.EnglishText: We've been staying here for a while,relying on everyone's kindness.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにほら、こちら歳若い方 ばかりでいらっしゃいますでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: And really, everyone here is so young and full of energy.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が面倒見なきゃ、と使命に 感じましてねェ
Entry.EnglishText: So I simply felt it was my duty to look after you all properly.
Well then, do take care, dear.
